modal.external.title: External Wallet
modal.external.walletconnect-copy: Click on the QR Code to copy to clipboard
modal.external.walletconnect-subtitle: Scan the QR code with a WalletConnect-compatible wallet
modal.header-subtitle: Select one of the following options to continue
modal.header-subtitle-new: Your blockchain wallet with one click
modal.header-tooltip-desc: The wallet serves as an account to store and manage your digital assets on the blockchain.
modal.network.add-request: This site is requesting to add a network
modal.network.switch-request: This site is requesting to switch networks
modal.popup.phone-body: Your country code will be detected automatically, but if you're using a phone number from a different country, you'll need to enter the correct country code manually.
modal.social.policy: We do not store any data related to your social logins.
modal.passkey.register-desc: With passkeys, you can verify your identity through your face, fingerprint, or security keys.
modal.post-loading.connected: You are connected with your account
